entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023
